content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE Movies;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Movies (
	[MovieId] nvarchar(256),
	[Title] nvarchar(256),
	[Genre] nvarchar(256),
	[Rating] nvarchar(256),
	[ReleaseYear] int,
	[Runtime] int,
	[AvailabilityDate] nvarchar(256),
	[StreamingAvailabilityDate] nvarchar(256),
	[Tier] int,
	[DataSourceId] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Movies',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_southridgedatalake01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.Movies
GO
